metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2717 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in libstagefright in Mozilla Firefox before 38.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow and out-of-bounds read) via an MP4 video file containing invalid metadata.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2717` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 38.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 38.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 38.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 38.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '38.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
